H0.text: Visible light is a broad band within the electromagnetic spectrum.

H1.text: Visible light in the electromagnetic spectrum is a narrow band within the spectrum.

H2.text: Visible light makes up 50 percent of the electromagnetic spectrum.

H3.text: Visible light makes up more than 75 percent of the electromagnetic spectrum.

A4.text: Visible light spans the visible spectrum and is usually defined as having wavelengths in the range of 400–700 nanometres (nm), corresponding to frequencies of 750–420 terahertz.
